website_summaries.verdict: Its flexibility, premium display, and processing power makes this laptop a fine choice for creative users and streaming video enthusiasts alike.
cons: Its cooling fan could be quieter

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop...poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Specs are good.. it's not a gaming laptop as it throttles a lot. Solid performance and good value for the money. Problem is, poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eng. M

customer_reviews.title: Charging is useless
customer_reviews.text: Start using it for the third day, and already the adapter is useless. Not sure if it is the battery’s issue or the adapter’s issue. The adapter’s light comes on but it just won’t charge into the computer. Bought it for the sole purpose of my long business trip, now it is useless since it can’t charge and I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Performance Beast
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, nicely spec'd out for the price. Bear in mind there is an OLED non touch version as well, but this 4K IPS screen still looks fantastic and has touch capability.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, no any complaints so far (using for 2 weeks already). One thing to be aware of - Windows 10 Home is not activated initially. Tried many times during this period, it was giving an error message "Windows reported that no product key was found on your device". Tried again yesterday and it was successfully activated. Not sure what was the reason, maybe you need to wait some time until the purchase is verified on Microsoft's side as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great Laptop/Desktop replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device to give me desktop capabilities in a mobile platform (read around the house and lab). It is too heavy and big to take on the road by me. I do see some people carrying larger devices on planes, trains, and Uber. This machine is very fast and the screen is great. I have been able to not only develop software products but also design 3D printable (Fusion 360) objects with this device. Battery life for about 4 hours. A good purchase
customer_reviews.author: G. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: THE SPEAKERS ARE NOT FUNCTIONING and PRODUCING WEIRD NOISE
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this computer in October, and started using it fully only in December. While we did not use it for listening to something/watching videos, we did not try the sound system. However, a few days ago, we tried to listen to music via earphones, we plugged them into the laptop, however, no sound came. We thought there are some things that need to be changed in settings. No results. Today, things went worse. When we opened a youtube video, the speakers started producing some weird and very loud noise, we were first scared, but in the end had to turn off the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Fan Noise
customer_reviews.text: After just two weeks, it turned out that the fan noise of this laptop is really bad and loud. I will never ever try any Dell laptop in my lifetime. Just buy Macbook pro 16' It has better customer support and build quality. Why look for a mac alternative? Price is not a big deal for this high-end level computers. I initially liked this laptop a lot, but not anymore. Ahhhhh!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry_gm

customer_reviews.title: This thing is powerful
customer_reviews.text: It’s a powerful laptop. It could easily replace a desktop. Great screen resolution. Has a few annoying quarks. For example, when you open it you need to use both hands. Also the WiFi keeps dropping off but that’s easily fixed & is more of a Windows 10 issue.
customer_reviews.author: Omid Shiri

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile and future proof
customer_reviews.text: At this pricepoint, I can't find an alternative that beats the Dell XPS 15. RAM up-gradable, great speed w 9th gen i7 and 16gb ram, can't tire it out with my ram intensive workloads. The screen is a beauty and the speakers are surprisingly way better than expected. This laptop offers the essentials you need with tiny luxuries like long battery, thunderbolt connectivity, and overall great specs. Love the big storage for a not-so-ridiculous price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good
customer_reviews.text: Feels very well put together, as opposed to some other PC laptops I've tried. Seriously sturdy. Nice tactile feel in the keys, too.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell F.

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop in October, 2019. Everything worked fine until July 2020. Tried to turn it on one morning and it would not turn on. I cannot power it up and it will not turn on. I took it to Geek Squad for an evaluation and they told me there is nothing they can do short of replacing the motherboard. I will never buy a Dell computer again.
customer_reviews.author: Searching

customer_reviews.title: Infrequent Coil Whine
customer_reviews.text: There was coin whining when I would turn the laptop on, but it has not occurred very frequently. Coin whine is p common most laptop brands, wouldn't stress too much about it. Laptop came in fine, and there doesn't seem to be anything wrong with it yet. (will update in 6 months)

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kid to start college for computer engineering and he loves it. He also uses it to produce music and he’s extremely satisfied with this laptop. He hasn’t tested the battery life much as it is set up on his desk, but we’ll see as he starts taking it around. Highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Color accuracy 👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop but color accuracy sucks... I miss my macbook just for that. If youre getting this for entertainment, online surfing or school work great. If you plan to do any video or picture editing dont even think about it.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Cursor!
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer's display quality and its sleekness. It is really rich. My biggest issue thus far is the sticking or freezing of the cursor at certain moments while using Google classroom. This is really annoying especially at this price. I am trying to investigate what can be done to solve this problem otherwise I will have to send it back if can't resolve it myself. If it weren't for the this cursor problem it would get a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Triple G

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It honestly beat expectations and they somehow fixed the throttling issues. It runs exceptionally well doing hard tasks and stays relatively cool
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Known wireless issues with all Killer Network cards
customer_reviews.text: Search “Dell XPS Killer Wifi" these key words on google before you dump $2K. there is no customer support FYI.
customer_reviews.author: company PURCHASING

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop for uni work and it has performed very well. I can run a few virtual machines, listen to music, and research at the same time. The only down fall is it doesn't have an ethernet port you'll have to buy an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: E.S

customer_reviews.title: Constantly randomly shuts down.
customer_reviews.text: It randomly shuts down without warning very often. Have had to open up and disconnect battery several times to get it to start up again. I just purchased less than a year ago. I am absolutely disgusted at this point. That was alot of money for me and my job greatly depends on my personal computer.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance And Design
customer_reviews.text: Few things about the laptop : 1. Good quality and Built 2. Wonderful performance 3. Sleek Design 4. Good battery life 5. Work great for my daily usage as a software developer
customer_reviews.author: Rif

customer_reviews.title: Service
customer_reviews.text: Please add 2 year Asurion plan $137.00 and Norton 3 device protection plan$ 19.00 yearly. Could not reach anyone to add these items. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: l
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the reason is, the screen is shaking, it's getting a lot better recently. in the beginning, it really bothered me
customer_reviews.author: liufangqing

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer! It does everything a small business owner needs for it to do!!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick L Brunson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't hold a charge. It last about an hour before dying.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer and is working flawlessly. Recommended. Most of the bugs from previous gens seem to have been worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredmsg

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The insertion port for the battery charger is made of plastic and breaks almost immediately. According to Dell, this is a known issue. Have been trying to get them to repair this for 3 months. Still waiting. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gary's E.

customer_reviews.title: If you use any adobe software, do not buy any XPS 15 with Nvidia GPU.
customer_reviews.text: If you use any adobe software, do not buy any XPS 15 with Nvidia GPU. I have a XPS 15 7590 and I'm experiencing brightness flickering in adobe software. It is so bad that I couldn't use my laptop in last 6-7 months. I contacted Dell, Adobe, Intel and Nvidia but all of them said they can not fix this issue. Just doesn’t make sense to me to buy a laptop for more than $2k and not be able to use photoshop without issue. I ordered my laptop from dell.com but i'm writing a review here so nobody makes the same mistake I made.
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought brand new direct from Dell. Within the first week USB issues started. All audio would cut out (USB headset) and Ethernet would go down to a few Kbps (using a dongle). I replaced the USB hub and Ethernet dongle with brand new devices (Amazon brand name and Cable Matters; both reliable brands). The same exact issue happened. I plugged in an old laptop and the issues did not appear at all. After more than a month going back and forth with Dell, the screen finally went out. Since I didn't return the laptop before day 30 (but I did contact them about the problems within the 30 day window) they refuse to return or replace the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Superb for my work from home needs. Workhorse.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for just shy of a month. I was looking to replace my Lenovo which was sluggish and had no touch screen. The display on this Dell is very crisp with brilliant color. It has performed perfectly with all day personal/professional tasks. I am more used to an Apple environment but my work needs required Windows and a Microsoft equipped lap top. The touch screen is very responsive. The charge to the fastest I have seen. I love the lighted keyboard. The lightness to carry is a real benefit. I had considered a desk top model but this is so quick and easy on the eye that it will serve me better.
customer_reviews.author: Quickbeam

customer_reviews.title: Great, powerful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has all the power you need in a very sleek and small size. The battery life is impressive, even with some heavy duty software and network gaming. The graphics and resolution are great. While the price is a little higher then I usually pay for a laptop, the performance of this machine justifies it easily. It’s sleek size makes it the perfect fit for a backpack or messenger bag. I am able to carry and use it all day long for work.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Incredible laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far the very best laptop I have owned. The screen is incredibly sharp; the touch screen feature is incredibly convenient; the accessories (fingerprint reader ID; all day battery life; triangle stand viewing) are all exceptional. There was some struggle downloading Microsoft and the fingerprint reader took a long time to scan all the print it needed but I have used this now for more than a week (nearly two) and have never been more satisfied with a laptop. Can't recommend this highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence R. Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: I am a Dell  person.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased directly from Dell. Got top of the line. Very well made. Good looking. Fast. Great screen with little glare. Good keyboard. But...runs hot. Noisy. Fan pushes exhaust just below screen in front. I felt the air while computing. Had operating system problems. Worked on it two weeks trying to get things sorted out. Meanwhile, the hot keyboard and exhaust air kept my attention. Dell made the return easy. Old Dell going strong after 8 years. Will wait for next generation. Love Dell, not this one.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Alpha male

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Get the lowest version that has the discreet graphics card and upgrade the ssd and ram yourself to save a lot of money and get better parts. Then, redo the thermal paste and undervolt and this machine is a BEAST! I got mine undervolted to -.120v and works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Me

product_meta.title: Dell XPS 15 laptop 15.6", 4K UHD InfinityEdge Touch, 9th Gen Intel Core i7-9750H, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB GDDR5, 1TB SSD storage, 16GB RAM, XPS7590-7565SLV-PUS
product_meta.description: The world's smallest 15. 6-inch performance laptop with a stunning InfinityEdge display. Now featuring 8th Gen Intel Core processorswith up to 6 cores and 12 threads.
feature_bullets: 15.6" 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) InfinityEdge anti-reflective touch IPS 100% a do be RGB 500-nits display
9th Generation Intel Core i7-9750h (12MB Cache, up to 4. 5 GHz, 6 Cores)
Backlit English keyboard with fingerprint reader. Bluetooth 5.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars100 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
